TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class PagedDataSource : System.Collections.ICollection, System.ComponentModel.ITypedList

Public NotInheritable Class PagedDataSource Implements ICollection, ITypedList
public ref class PagedDataSource sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::ComponentModel::ITypedList
type PagedDataSource = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface ITypedList

summary.span: 封裝資料繫結控制項 (例如 、、 和 ) 的分頁相關屬性，以允許控制項執行分頁。

span.span: Encapsulates the paging-related properties of a data-bound control (such as , , , and ) that allow it to perform paging.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會封裝屬性，讓資料來源控制項，例如， ， ，和，若要執行分頁。The class encapsulates the properties that allow data-source controls, such as the , , , and , to perform paging. 這個類別是由控制項開發人員使用，提供分頁支援自訂的資料繫結控制項時。This class is used by control developers when providing paging support to a custom data-bound control. 這個類別會使用可用的最佳方法，列舉屬於目前頁面的資料。This class uses the best available method to enumerate over the data belonging to the current page. 如果基礎資料來源支援索引的存取 (例如和)，這個類別會使用它。If the underlying data source supports indexed access (such as and ), this class uses it. 否則，它會使用所建立的列舉值方法。Otherwise, it uses the enumerator created by the method. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||00| ||1010| ||00|

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料繫結控制項中是否啟用自訂分頁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether custom paging is enabled in a data-bound control.

value.span: 如果啟用自訂分頁，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if custom paging is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，指出是否啟用自訂分頁。Use the property to indicate whether custom paging is enabled. 自訂的分頁是選擇性的類型，特別是藉由提供分頁的控制項。Custom paging is an optional type of paging provided specifically by the control. ASP.NET 2.0 版資料繫結控制項 (例如， ，和) 會使用伺服器端分頁，並不支援自訂分頁。ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound control (such as , , and ) uses server-side paging and does not support custom paging. 自訂的分頁和伺服器端分頁會互斥。Custom paging and server-side paging are mutually exclusive. 如果您設定要`true`，請確認設定為`false`。If you set to `true`, be sure that is set to `false`. 如需有關自訂分頁的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about custom paging, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowPaging { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料繫結控制項中是否啟用分頁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether paging is enabled in a data-bound control.

value.span: 如果啟用分頁，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if paging is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定資料繫結控制項是否已啟用分頁。Use the property to specify whether a data-bound control has paging enabled. ASP.NET 2.0 版資料繫結控制項 (例如， ，和) 也使用伺服器端分頁提供自動的分頁功能。ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls (such as , , and ) also use server-side paging to provide automatic paging functionality. 如需有關伺服器端分頁的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on server-side paging, see . 當使用控制項，您也可以提供您自己自訂的分頁邏輯。When using the control, you can also provide your own custom paging logic. 如需有關自訂分頁的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和。For more information on custom paging, see and . 如需有關資料繫結控制項的分頁支援的詳細資訊，請參閱`AllowPaging`資料繫結控制項的屬性。For more information about paging support for data-bound controls, see the `AllowPaging` property of the data-bound control.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用伺服器端分頁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether server-side paging is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用伺服器端分頁，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if server-side paging is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 2.0 版資料繫結控制項 (例如， ，和) 提供自動的分頁功能，透過伺服器端分頁。ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls (such as , , and ) provide automatic paging functionality through server-side paging. 使用 ASP.NET 2.0 資料繫結控制項，此屬性設定為`true`。When using an ASP.NET 2.0 data-bound control, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 伺服器端分頁和自訂的分頁會互斥。Server-side paging and custom paging are mutually exclusive. 如果您設定要`true`，請確認設定為`false`。If you set to `true`, be sure that is set to `false`.

summary.span: 從 中的指定索引開始，將所有的項目從資料來源複製到指定的 。

span.span: Copies all the items from the data source to the specified , starting at the specified index in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來將資料來源的內容複製到指定、 指定的索引處開始。Use this method to copy the contents of the data source into the specified , starting at the specified index. 通常會用來逐一查看資料來源中的項目。The is often used to iterate through the items in the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 從資料來源取得要使用的項目數。

span.span: Gets the number of items to be used from the data source.

value.span: 資料來源中要使用的項目數。

span.span: The number of items to be used from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷要使用資料來源中的項目數。Use the property to determine the number of items to be used from the data source. 傳回的值取決於是否啟用分頁，以及是否使用自訂分頁。The value returned depends on whether paging is enabled and whether custom paging is used. - 如果已停用分頁 (藉由設定屬性，以`false`)，值會傳回屬性。If paging is disabled (by setting the property to `false`), the value of the property is returned. - 如果啟用分頁 (藉由設定屬性，以`true`) 並啟用自訂分頁 (藉由設定屬性設定為`true`)，值會傳回屬性。If paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`) and custom paging is enabled (by setting the property set to `true`), the value of the property is returned. - 如果啟用分頁 (藉由設定屬性，以`true`) 和屬性設定為`false`，值會傳回屬性。If paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`) and the property is set to `false`, the value of the property is returned. - 如果啟用分頁 (藉由設定屬性，以`true`)，已停用自訂分頁 (藉由設定屬性`false`)，而屬性設定為`true`，值屬性的值減去屬性傳回之前。If paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`), custom paging is disabled (by setting the property `false`), and the property is set to `true`, the value of the property is subtracted from the value of the property before it is returned. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性包含`null`，就會傳回 0。If the property contains `null`, 0 is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷資料來源中的項目數。Use the property to determine the number of items in the data source. 如果使用自訂分頁或伺服器端分頁，則值屬性會傳回; 否則會傳回資料來源中的項目總數。If custom paging or server-side paging is used, the value of the property is returned; otherwise, the total number of items in the data source is returned. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性包含`null`，就會傳回 0。If the property contains `null`, 0 is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來建立，可以會逐一查看以取得資料來源中的每個項目。Use this method to create a that can be iterated through to get each item in the data source. 若要存取列舉值目前位置的項目，請使用屬性。To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the property. 使用方法，以移至下一步 的項目集合中。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 若要將列舉程式移至其初始位置，使用方法。To move the enumerator to its initial position, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您一開始取得列舉值，或使用方法，將列舉程式移至第一個項目在集合中，您必須呼叫方法。When you initially get the enumerator or use the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the method. 項目，否則為表示屬性未定義。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined.

for all cases.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsServerPagingEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool IsServerPagingEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否啟用伺服器端分頁支援。

value.span: 如果已啟用分頁，並且使用 屬性表示伺服器端分頁，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if paging is enabled and server-side paging is indicated using the property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用伺服器端分頁時並屬性都設為`true`，且無法在單一頁面中顯示的資料來源所擷取的資料量。Server-side paging is enabled when the and properties are both set to `true`, and the amount of data retrieved by the data source cannot be displayed in a single page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出對資料來源的存取是否為同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the data source is synchronized (thread-safe).
for all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性衍生自類別，並會覆寫以一律傳回`false`來指示此類別不具備執行緒安全。This property is derived from the class and is overridden to always return `false` to indicate that this class is not thread-safe. 如需詳細資訊屬性，請參閱 < 屬性介面。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷資料來源中顯示的所有項目所需的頁面數目。Use the property to determine the number of pages necessary to display all items in the data source. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性是`null`，就會傳回 0。If the property is `null`, 0 is returned. 如果屬性設定為`false`或屬性設定為 0 或更小，則傳回 1。If the property is set to `false` or the property is set to 0 or less, 1 is returned.

value.span: 使用自訂分頁時，資料來源中項目的虛擬數目。

span.span: The virtual number of items in the data source when custom paging is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷資料來源中項目的虛擬數目使用自訂分頁或伺服器端分頁時。Use the property when custom paging or server-side paging is used to determine the virtual number of items in the data source. 如需詳細資訊屬性，請參閱。For more information on the property, see .
